data.text: @FootballNCState @NCAA @PackFootball @StateCoachD @ESPNCFB @NCAAFootball @PackPride @chandlerzavala1 @247Sports @espn @NCState @NCAA The definition of stumbling all over your feet.

@FootballNCState @NCAA @PackFootball @StateCoachD @ESPNCFB @NCAAFootball @PackPride @chandlerzavala1 @247Sports @espn @NCState I thought they gave all fall athletes an extra year of eligibility,, isn’t this Thayer’s 5th yr..??? That’s the epitome of No Clue !
